form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No. 43-R0052. FEE STAMP APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES 15,00 FEE PAID No AUB72-17283 as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Naturalization Service Immigration and Nationality Act Date 4/8/77 Albany, N. Y. Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball-point pen. Verified by TC issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt Wu, Chi-Su Liang Card with this application if you checked "Issuance" above. C/O IN CARE OF Dr. Julian Juh-Ren Wu If you checked Extension" you must submit the reentry per- mit you wish to have extended. (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) MAILING ADDRESS 4 Sage Hill Lane ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER (City) (State) AZIR Gode) IN U.S. Menands, New York 12204 A- 19 320 867 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month. Day, Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR 2-8-14 China Republic of China Brown Black HEIGHT 5 FEET 1/2 INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS None. 3. I DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS GRANTED Wu, Chi-Su Liang Albany, N.Y. 01-02-74 2-20-74 FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME Liang, Se-Tze Lo, Bow-Yuan 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL Wu, Chi-Su Liang Los Angles, Cal. 01-29-77 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: China Airlines 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD Los Angeles, Cal. July 10, 1977 1 year or MORE NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL China Airlines FILL IN ITEM 7. ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. Republic of China (Taiwan). February 20, 1976 8. FILL-IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND INATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MY LAST PERMIT (City and State) IS ATTACHED February 9, 1976 Albany, N.Y. IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED, STATE EXPIRATION DATE February 9, 1977 ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER None SOCIALÂ® SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER 388-70-9424 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District (Country) 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) 20-2 Lane 44 Kimen St (King men St.) Taipei, Taiwan Republic of China Republic of China (Taiwan). 12. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and complete): To visit with my husband. RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D TRANS. OUT COMPLETED FORM I-131 (Rev. 4-1-76)N OVER JUN 13 1977 JUN 16
